Properties.Name: UniversalDataExchangeXML

v8:item.v8:content: Conversion Rule Data Exchange in XML format

Properties.Name: SafeImport
Properties.Comment: Loading data according to rules that are supplied separately from the data.

v8:item.v8:content: Run data import by the rules specified in the "Rules file" attribute.

Properties.Name: AlgorithmsDebugMode
Properties.Comment: 0 - without debugging, 1-standard procedure call, 2-procedure call with handler parameters, 3 - direct insertion of code into the handler
